title: Fact Check Team: Did YouTube block all anti-vaccine content?
author: JANAE BOWENS; JOHN SEWARD; The National Desk
description: WASHINGTON (SBG) - YouTube expanded their content ban on COVID-19 vaccine misinformation to now include misinformation about all vaccines. Several news outlets are reporting that YouTube is banning all anti-vaccine content. The Fact Check Team did some digging and found that was not quite the case. According to YouTube's updated vaccine misinformation policy, there are instances when anti-vaccine content is allowed.
